member.name: CMC_ADD_EXTENSIONS_INFO
member.summary: The CMC_ADD_EXTENSIONS_INFO structure contains certificate extension control attributes to be added to a certificate.

member.name: CMC_ADD_EXTENSIONS_INFO.cCertReference
member.summary: DWORD count of elements in the rgdwCertReference array.

member.name: CMC_ADD_EXTENSIONS_INFO.cExtension
member.summary: DWORD count of the elements in the rgExtension array.

member.name: CMC_ADD_EXTENSIONS_INFO.rgExtension
member.summary: Array of pointers to the certificate extensions to be added.
